title: Jarvan one shot any squishy, no counter
body:
Build for Jarvan that is a guaranteed one shot on any squishy champ with no counter-play. 

* Run the usual electrocute runes
* Titanic, Youmuus, Black Cleaver, Mortal Reminder, Randuins Omen, either Merc treads or Tabi.
* Activate titanic, jump on squishy with e q combo. If you miss, press R. This will one shot any adc, caster, or squishy support.

replies.body: Thank you! I love J4, but fuck me dead - I am terrible at him.
